title: 92/526/EEC: Commission Decision of 4 November 1992 amending Decision 92/325/EEC concerning animal health conditions and veterinary certificates for the importation of domestic animals of the bovine and porcine species from Bulgaria
header:
COMMISSION DECISION  of 4 November 1992  amending Decision 92/325/EEC concerning animal health conditions and veterinary certificates for the importation of domestic animals of the bovine and porcine species from Bulgaria  (92/526/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 4 November 1992. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28. (2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13. (3) OJ No L 177, 30. 6. 1992, p. 52.
